original_text:
When she saw Peter warming himself, she looked closely at him.
“You also were with that Nazarene, Jesus,” she said.
korean_text: 베드로가 불 쬐고 있는 것을 보고 주목하여 이르되 너도 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었도다 하거늘

sentences.original_text: When she saw Peter warming himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 베드로가 스스로를 따뜻하게 하는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: You also were with that Nazarene, Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 당신도 그 나사렛 사람 예수와 함께 있었군요
